infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library in order to upload your profile picture
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Apera would like to access  your location so that we can provide  you with gigs near your location accurately

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app accesses your microphone to record a voice message
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to save your photos

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app accesses your location so that we can provide you with the best experience possible
